Hello!

Though I am not new to K.S.P. I only just made my forum account recently and I have no idea how to change avatar or signature (signature isn't important).

If my avatar needs to be pre-approved here's a link to it: https://imgflip.com/i/at3en.

Any help is sincerely appreciated.

Welcome to the forums!

You can update your avatar by following these instructions, but only after you've made a few posts. You're still in the Curious George user group.

New users are not able to change signatures, avatars and such.

After a some time (3 posts) those forum features will automatically become available to you. You could have known this if you had read the Forum FAQ.

P.S.

The only 'stupid' question is the one you do not ask.

Edited August 2, 2014 by Tex_NL
Oopsie. Duplicate threads merged. And yes, post a few more times, and you will be automatically granted full member status.
hint : if you reply to us now in this thread a few times you could be able to do it by then...

The only 'stupid' question is the one you do not ask.

Ninja'd before I even opened the thread :-)

Thanks to everyone for the advice/answers!

But like someone who never reads instructions, the only thing I read prior to making the post was the rules.

So please excuse my ignorance.

I too just created an account after lurking here for quite some time. I was actually wondering the same thing that the OP did. I had read the FAQs, just not the ones you linked. I wonder if it's something that we should bring up to the mods?
